name: SARSCoronavirus2NGeneQualitativeAndQuantitative
title: SARS Coronavirus 2 N Gene, Qualitative and Quantitative
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to qualitative and quantitative detection of nucleic acids within the nucleoprotein (N) gene of SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in various specimens.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes detection of nucleic acids within the nucleoprotein (N) gene of SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in various specimens.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
